name: catchpenny
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
cheap and seeming attractive, but not made or expected to last: The club's catchpenny decor was clearly aimed at the tourist trade. The theme may be catchpenny, but it's a guaranteed attraction. This is nothing more than a catch-penny pamphlet.
More examplesFewer examplesSome of our most renowned beauty spots have been ruined by catchpenny visitor centres. Just about the only thing the two books have in common is their catchpenny titles. Please spare us the catchpenny philosophy and get on with the story!
